fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
-Generate Barrier (2-shot): Place two ‘barriers’ on the player list for tonight, splitting the player list in two. Any actions that target a player on the other side of the barrier will fail. **Locked**: Beasts ignore the barriers and may target anyone.
-Antithesis (1-shot): Reverse attacking and defending abilities. *Any* ability that deals an attack will instead grant defense of the same tier, and any ability that grants defense will instead deal an attack of the same tier.
-Release Energy (**Locked**): Every time you are attacked after unlocking this, you will store the attack, which you may then use as a night action without invoking the direct attack limit.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
-Players killed by you will appear as **Refracted by Novacryst**
-If you are attacked and survive, you will instantly deal a counterattack with a tier one lower than the original attack’s power to the attacker.
-You have a 2-shot Powerful autovest.
-**Unlock Condition**: After you are attacked for the first time, Unlock.
